channel.title: Export maps of another Source mod to Black Mesa
channel.description:
Hi! I wanna ask you about this. In Adrenaline Gamer there is a map that I like it, and I wanna export it to Black Mesa. The problem is textures and models. I dunno what should I do.
If you can help or show me a guide of how can I do this I would be very happy! :smiley:
Thanks :slight_smile:

item.title: Export maps of another Source mod to Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
The file path to whatever mod your map is for. For example, “C:\Steam\steamapps\sourcemods\containment”

Read full topic

item.source: Export maps of another Source mod to Black Mesa

item.title: Export maps of another Source mod to Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Well, there’s no guarantee it will work and be totally compatible, but if you have the mod the map is for, you can mount its assets in Black Mesa’s gameinfo.txt.

Open Black Mesa’s gameinfo.txt (in the Black Mesa\bms directory), and add a new line in the SearchPaths section (should start at around line 105).

Game "filepathToSourceMod"

Read full topic
item.source: Export maps of another Source mod to Black Mesa
